briefdescription.para: A form was embedded as a widget on another form.
A form was opened as a new dialog.
A widget was opened as a popup (e.g. attribute table editor widget)
Single edit mode, for editing a single feature.

detaileddescription.para: Add feature mode, for setting attributes for a new feature. In this mode the dialog will be editable even with an invalid feature and will add a new feature when the form is accepted.

briefdescription.para: Multi edit mode, for editing fields of multiple features at once.
Form values are used for searching/filtering the layer.
Form is in aggregate search mode, show each widget in this mode.
Identify the feature.
modes
This context is not defined by a relation.
When showing a list of features (e.g. houses as an embedded form in a district form)
When showing a single feature (e.g. district information when looking at the form of a house)
Determines in which direction a relation was resolved.
Store the values of the currently edited form or table row.
Constructor for QgsAttributeEditorContext.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QgsAttributeEditorContext &parentContext, const QgsRelation &relation, RelationMode relationMode, FormMode widgetMode)
memberdef.name: QgsAttributeEditorContext

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the attribute editor should permit use of custom UI forms.
Returns current attributeFormMode.
Returns given attributeFormMode as string.
Returns the distance area object used for area/length calculations.
Returns current feature from the currently edited form or table row.
Returns the form mode.

to zoom to related features).

QGIS 3.2

briefdescription.para: Returns the attribute relation.
Returns the attribute relation mode.
Sets whether the attribute editor should permit use of custom UI forms.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to allow custom UI forms, or false to disable them and use default generated QGIS forms

briefdescription.para: Set attributeFormMode for the edited form.
Sets distance area object, distanceArea, for area/length calculations.
Set current feature for the currently edited form or table row.
Sets the form mode.

detaileddescription.para:
to zoom to related features).

briefdescription.para: Set attribute relation and mode.
Sets the associated vector layer tools.
Returns the associated vector layer tools.
This class contains context information for attribute editor widgets.

detaileddescription.para: It will be passed to embedded widgets whenever this occurs (e.g. when showing an embedded form due to relations)
